## ResourceManager.deserializeObject() method

Deserialize a JSON structure into an object instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deserializeObject<T extends object>(ctx: any, json: object): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

ctx


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

Context object passed to custom constructors/resolvers.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

json


</td><td>

object


</td><td>

The serialized JSON structure.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;T&gt;

A Promise resolving to the reconstructed object instance, or `null` on failure.

## Remarks

- Uses the `ClassName` field to locate the registered class. - Supports custom `createFunc` and phased property loading.
